channel.title: Act 1 :: SANS Holiday Hack Challenge 2025
channel.description: The Counter Hack crew is in the Neighborhood festively preparing for the holidays when they are suddenly overrun by lively Gnomes in Your Home! There must have been some magic in those Gnomes, because, due to some unseen spark, some haunting hocus pocus, they have come to life and are now scurrying around the Neighborhood.

item.title: Holiday Hack Orientation
item.description: Lynn Schifano mission statement Welcome to the 2025 SANS Holiday Hack Challenge! Weâ€™re on a train headingâ€¦ NOT to the North Pole, but instead to The Neighborhood. Your cybersecurity skills are needed there this year! Iâ€™m here to help orient you to this yearâ€™s exciting challenge. Iâ€™m the Chief of Staff at Counter Hack, making sure the right people are doing the right thing at the right place at the right time â€“ Herding cats, in other words.

item.title: Santa's Gift Tracking Service Port Mystery
item.description: Yori Kvitchko mission statement Hi! Iâ€™m Yori. I was Edâ€™s lost intern back in 2015, but I was found! Think you can check out this terminal for me? I need to use cURL to access the gift tracker system, but it has me stumped. Please see what you can do! Terminal By listing the home directory we find a README.txt file:

item.title: Visual Network Thinger
item.description: Jared Folkins mission statement Jared Folkins here! My favorite Christmas movie is White Christmas. You should find me on the socials and tell me what yours is. You know, I think Santa is right! It truly is better to give than to receive. I love singing Carols with my family! ðŸŽµO holy night, the stars are brightly shiningâ€¦ðŸŽµ Santaâ€™s got the right idea about giving, and Iâ€™m excited to give you a fantastic way to learn networking fundamentals!

item.title: Blob Storage Challenge in the Neighborhood
item.description: Grace Goose mission statement HONK!!! HONK!!!! The Neighborhood HOA uses Azure storage accounts for various IT operations. Youâ€™ve been asked to audit their storage security configuration to ensure no sensitive data is publicly accessible. Recent security reports suggest some storage accounts might have public blob access enabled, creating potential data exposure risks. Blob Challenge Terminal

item.title: Spare Key
item.description: Barry Goose mission statement You want me to say what exactly? Do I really look like someone who says MOOO? The Neighborhood HOA hosts a static website on Azure Storage. An admin accidentally uploaded an infrastructure config file that contains a long-lived SAS token. Use Azure CLI to find the leak and report exactly where it lives. Spare Key Terminal

item.title: Owner
item.description: Yori Kvitchko mission statement Terminal James Goose mission debrief
